original_query: SELECT MIN(p.Id) FROM posts as p, postLinks as pl, postHistory as ph WHERE p.Id = pl.PostId AND pl.PostId = ph.PostId AND p.CreationDate>=CAST('2010-07-19 20:08:37' AS TIMESTAMP) AND ph.CreationDate>=CAST('2010-07-20 00:30:00' AS TIMESTAMP)
rewritten_query: CREATE VIEW E1 AS SELECT * FROM posts AS posts WHERE posts.CreationDate >= TIMESTAMP '2010-07-19 20:08:37'
CREATE VIEW E3 AS SELECT * FROM postHistory AS postHistory WHERE postHistory.CreationDate >= TIMESTAMP '2010-07-20 00:30:00'
CREATE UNLOGGED TABLE E1E3 AS SELECT * FROM E1 WHERE EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM E3 WHERE E1.Id=E3.PostId)
CREATE VIEW E2 AS SELECT * FROM postLinks AS postLinks
CREATE UNLOGGED TABLE E1E3E2 AS SELECT MIN(Id) AS EXPR$0 FROM E1E3 WHERE EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM E2 WHERE E1E3.Id=E2.PostId)
